ygData.subject: Re: Plus mana items versus Plus Int and Wisdom
ygData.msgSnippet: So if you get lots of +int items to wear as you level, you will get a mana boost your next level?  If this holds, do you keep the mana if you remove the items
ygData.messageBody:
So if you get lots of +int items to wear as you level, you will get a mana
boost your next level? If this holds, do you keep the mana if you remove
the items or how does that work?

-Solric


-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes [mailto:mstokes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 4:25 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Plus mana items versus Plus Int and Wisdom


Don Bickner wrote:

Hello everyone, Can anyone tell me the difference between a +mana item
versus a +int and wis item. I have a chance to buy the Savants cap for about
30 plat and am wondering why it could be worth that much since I could just
a + mana ring for a whole lot less. Also in wearing the cap I would have to
give up on my Halo of light. Thanks Kueken, Mith Marr

A plus mana item will add the specified amount of mana to your mana pool.
A plus intelligence item will effect your mana indirectly. A good rule of
thumb is that for every extra 5 points of intelligence you will add 1 point
of mana per level
